SELECT c.`id`,c.`tag_name`,SUM(CASE WHEN a.`id` IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END ) as productCount FROM `cms_bt_promotion_codes` AS a JOIN `cms_bt_promotion_codes_tag` AS b ON a.`id`=b.`cms_bt_promotion_codes_id` AND a.`promotion_id`=#{promotionId} AND a.`product_code` IN #{item}
RIGHT JOIN `cms_bt_tag` AS c ON b.`cms_bt_tag_id`=c.`id` WHERE c.`parent_tag_id`=3 GROUP BY c.`id`
